website_summaries.verdict: The best all-around fish finder from Garmin with a great viewing screen and accessible controls.
pros: Multi-frequency sonar can detect various types of fish in the water
Large scanning area for better resolution
Built-in flasher ideal for ice fishing
Everything is controlled with a few simple buttons
cons: Depth finder does not work properly at speeds above 5 miles per hour

customer_reviews.title: Does not draw maps
customer_reviews.text: The product write-up led me to believe this unit has the capability to create topographical maps. It does not. It does keep track of gps coordinates and paths, but is unable to create maps. Had I known this I would not have bought this unit Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Mike Obleman

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This unit does not work well with the Minn Kota Terrova trolling motor. It receives a lot of interference when the trolling motor is engaged. Tried everything and still interference. Switch units to Lowrance and viola the problem is resolved. Also, the mapping function on the unit is kind of pointless. Get a unit with the charts on it or card reader. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: michele gatt

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with maps
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with what it said it would have.. returned it
customer_reviews.author: Dolly leahy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this gps for a couple months now. Works great! Wish I could find a video or instructions on how to use the mapping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing is to have it hooked up before going on the water
customer_reviews.text: Good product took some time for GPS line to show up but was able to return to our start location when we were done.
customer_reviews.author: C Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Can I still return this?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fish finder / GPS for the St. Lawrence River. The way it’s advertised and even the picture on the box shows that it would have the ability to name all the islands but it does not. Unfortunately by the time I got it installed and out on the water due to high waters, it was past the return deadline. The quality is fantastic but it’s just not what I was looking for. If you are looking for a good fish finder this is fantastic but not the a great GPS. I’d love to be able to return for the actual GPS features I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Exact Item as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, should include a manual, which you have to download from the internet. For such an expensive item Garmin, should stop cutting corners and provide a decent manual. Works as described, easy to assimilate the menus and responses. Was able to install it in the previous Garmin swivel mount, so did not have to predrill and did not need the flush mount kit. Well packaged. The plastic mount at the transom, seems weak, so I bought the aftermarket metal one. Mounts sturdier and its stronger, no chance of it breaking off which is the impression I got from the original mount made by Garmin. Beautiful screen cover with the GARMIN logo. Connection wire after fuse should be longer.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It has no Charts why call it a gps????
customer_reviews.text: no Charts!!!!!! I hope Garmin takes care of my problem. I had my upgraded tower set up already rigged up and I can’t use it for what I need . Which is not hitting oyster beds . Waste of time and money why even sell this crap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Luzarraga

customer_reviews.title: Love the contour mapping but wish it had maps :)
customer_reviews.text: It does draw great maps. You have to read the directions and turn it on or it won't. I've mapped my entire lake with only a few trips and now it shows the contours of the entire lake. Please try again or ask for help.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S.

customer_reviews.title: No map
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with maps nor can you get any for this unit. I unfortunately have had it to long to return it. Would be great for an additional unit on the front of a bass boat.
customer_reviews.author: Monica McMullen

customer_reviews.title: No maps
customer_reviews.text: No maps available to buy from garmin. Wish I could return. Unfortunately didn’t get out on water to find out till now. Buy something you can download maps for.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Have this on my small boat, works just like it’s big brother..
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ellis

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: Good fish finder for the money. Easy to use.Clear view ,works nice.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: NO WIFI NO ACTIVE CAPTAIN!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: no wifi, no active captain - bought this after some research, thought I would be able to interface w/phone, now that the holes are drilled, sealed, and everything's mounted, turns out only the 7" and 9" units have the wifi..........
customer_reviews.author: Dogobat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: This gps has Turkish menu ant it is so easy to use.Thank you for fast shipping , i can recommend this item people who love catching fish.
customer_reviews.author: Cengizhan Gulyaz

customer_reviews.title: Garmin locator
customer_reviews.text: This locator is by far the best I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Pat McLafferty

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great fish finder, BUT!! the chart is of no help. Most important detail is that you CANNOT download or use a micro SD card to put charts in. I did not check first!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: No wi fi functionality
customer_reviews.text: Product claims built-in wifi but still does not support any wifi connectivity so Active Captain app is not supported
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing..... used to fish bass tournaments, now fish for fun...... great buy
customer_reviews.author: bassmaster134

customer_reviews.title: Good fish finder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just wish the fish were more defined
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: It lets you know whats'down there .
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and requirs some use to become proficent in understanding what it is displaying .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST FISH FINDER
customer_reviews.text: EVERYTHING IS GOOD, I LOVE THE FISH FINDER WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: David Forbes

customer_reviews.title: That I had customer service to call and the return policy
customer_reviews.text: It didn't have instructions on how to setup your transducer or minister to see the fish
customer_reviews.author: Lamont Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: NO BASE MAPS
customer_reviews.text: Buy something else if you want base maps. Just a yellow screen for chart. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great fish-finder, no way to use for Navigation
customer_reviews.text: A very good fish finder with excellent structure scan, I just don't understand why they don't include a way to use it as a chart plotter (it does have active GPS).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. West

customer_reviews.title: lots of information
customer_reviews.text: Works great lots of information I like that you can set waypoints easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Armburst

customer_reviews.title: High Tech Electronics
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit to replace an old paper graph one. Only have used it about 3 times and find using it and driving the boat and reading instructions is a task in itself, but each time I get a little more accustomed to it and think it will be just as I anticipated for fishing. I also use it in conjunction with the Navionics APP. All connections and wiring is appropriate for the unit.
customer_reviews.author: BobS

customer_reviews.title: NO GPS. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Has NO gps! What a shame for Garman to show pics of maps and say it has gps when it does not. I had this professional install and now I need to rip it out and get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Aero-Flex

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: My only problem is my trolling motor interferes with the screen..i have a friend with the same garmin and his doesnt do this so its my trolling motor causing the problem
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product and fast shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by mistake so I sent it back. I’m sure this would work good also.
customer_reviews.author: mike slavin

customer_reviews.title: Photo images of fish? NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Near photographic images of what passes below your boat??? NOT EVEN CLOSE. Unit is ok, provides good depth and other info, but I have yet to see ANYTHING that even comes close to resembling a fish. Even when I’m in still water at the dock and I can see with my own 2 eyes a large school of fish just below the transducer. Pffft good thing I’m not a fisherman!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great device for the price. Helps us find our way back to that special spot on the river.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE MAPPING VERY MISSLEADING
customer_reviews.text: The advertising as well as the website mention GPS and shows mapping but the unit only has bread crumb trails with no topographical features such as land or lakes etc. VERY Misleading and other than coordinates for emergencies this unit is not a GPS maps unit. If you want a decent depth finder and GPS data great but if you want a map feature unit DO NOT BUY and IT IS NOT CHIP or CARD Capable. $300 wasted!! Garmin should be ashamed>
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Unit was not as stated
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit, installed it in the boat only to find that the “plus “ feature which allows you to communicate via app on phone is nonexistent. Returned to store, disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Finder
customer_reviews.text: Simply the easiest to use fish finder I've owned. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Holub

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Finder
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Lowrance fish finder that would randomly freeze with this fish finder. I have used the Garmin fish finder for the last 10 days of fishing and it has performed great, a huge improvement over the Lowrance. To the people that give this fish finder a low rating because it dosent have pre-loaded maps you should have read the specifications and purchased the Echomap series. This fish finder does have gps and will record your tracks and allow you to enter waypoints.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Know what you’re buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Living on the coast the shorelines often change with storms and such. I have fished the same “deep holes” my father did. However, I can better see exactly where the holes are. When fishing ledges I can see the exact depths the fish are to better fish those areas. I enjoy fishing deep up the ledges to shallow. This thing is great, just spend a few extra bucks and go with a larger screen. Good product, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Not as described or pictured
customer_reviews.text: No charts and images are NOT as detailed as listing shows
customer_reviews.author: All American Mall

product_meta.title: Garmin Striker Plus 5cv with Transducer, 5" GPS Fishfinder with CHIRP Traditional and ClearVu Scanning Sonar Transducer and Built In Quickdraw Contours Mapping Software
product_meta.description: Style:FishfinderThe striker Plus 5cv Fishfinder with a bright 5” display and built-in GPS features Garmin CHIRP traditional sonar, Garmin CHIRP Clearly scanning sonar and Quickdraw Contours map drawing software, which stores up to 2 million acres of content with 1’ contours. The built-in GPS lets you mark and navigate to waypoints and shows your boat's speed.
feature_bullets: Includes transducer for built-in Garmin CHIRP traditional sonar plus CHIRP ClearVü scanning sonar
Built-in Garmin Quickdraw Contours mapping software lets you create and store maps with 1’ contours for up to 2 million acres
Built-in GPS lets you mark waypoints, create routes and view boat’s speed. Frequencies supported : Traditional: 50/77/200 kHz
Bright, sunlight-readable 5” display and intuitive user interface
Rugged design for every fishing environment. Display resolution: 800 x 480 pixels

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: STRIKER Plus 5cv, CV20-TM transducer, transom and trolling motor mounts, power/data cable, tilt/swivel mount and documentation
